|c|☆AphroditeIsReal|fucking
|c|☆AphroditeIsReal|UGHHHH
|c|☆Shotokekipurin|Gg! 
|c|☆AphroditeIsReal|There goes my motivation again.
|c|☆Shotokekipurin|You've done so well, my entire strategy literally folded lmao
|j| KarmaCodeZero
|l| KarmaCodeZero
|c|☆Shotokekipurin|DORJRIRBW I absolutely wanna apologize for doing so, I just really wanted to earn your badge because your team is so cool!
|c|☆AphroditeIsReal|If you hadnt had Acrobatics
|c|☆AphroditeIsReal|that Sacred wouldve murked you
|c|☆Shotokekipurin|Yeah
|c|☆Shotokekipurin|I sorta realized that Greninja doesn't actually get fairy coverage and I was banking on weavile knock offing my scarf because you apparently had a choice item
|c|☆Shotokekipurin|Didn't expect for you to actually have band there
|c|☆Shotokekipurin|If the range was slightly off, I definitely would've just died at the end
|l|☆AphroditeIsReal
